name: Handcrafted Teak Bowl
description: A beautiful bowl made from sustainable Thai teak wood, perfect for salads or display.

name: Traditional Myanmar Painting
description: Original artwork by a Myanmar artist, capturing the vibrant culture and landscapes.

name: Silk Scarf from Chiang Mai
description: Handwoven silk scarf in traditional patterns, soft and elegant.

name: Coffee Gift Basket
description: A selection of premium Thai and Myanmar coffee beans, with a French press included.

name: Bamboo Picnic Set
description: Eco-friendly picnic set with bamboo plates, cups, and utensils for four.

name: Handmade Pottery Vase
description: Unique vase crafted by local artisans, glazed in earthy tones.

name: Cooking Class Voucher
description: Voucher for a Thai or Myanmar cooking class for two people, includes all ingredients.

name: Spa Day Package
description: Relaxing spa day at a top Bangkok spa, includes massage and facial.

name: Hand-stitched Quilt
description: Colorful quilt made by a women's cooperative in Myanmar, queen size.

name: Private River Cruise
description: Two-hour private boat cruise on the Chao Phraya River for up to 6 people.
